conbody.p: There are several methods available for navigation.

ul.li: Button—A graphic you click to jump
Hypertext—Text you can click to jump to the target
Textual reference—A general reference that doesn't automatically jump the reader to the target

conbody.p: In addition, there are GUI mechanisms, such as menus, tabs and list boxes. These are mentioned for completeness, but won't be discussed further here, because they are uncommon features for technical documentation and behave the same as other links.
